name: I Lost My Gun
description:
WASD - to move

Left Mouse Button - to use flashlight

Use the flashlight on enemies to stun them. When they are stunned you can push them in the water to kill them. If you stun an enemie and dont push it in the water it will wake up and become angry. If an enemie is angry it will shoot faster, You can use the flashlight when the blue bar at the top is full. When you kill two enemies you can choose a powerup by pressing 1 2 or 3 on the keyboard. The score is how many enemies you have killed.
